content: To obtain the Thunder Tail, you need to defeat Red Loong in Forest of Wolves in Black Wind Mountain. You need the Loong Scales to be able to trigger this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunder_Tail.md', within the main section titled 'Thunder Tail'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Thunder Tail, you need to defeat Red Loong in Forest of Wolves in Black Wind Mountain. You need the Loong Scales to be able to trigger this fight.
